name: Some kind of Wonderful
description:
Shot on the original Digital Harinezumi camera. 

One of the 142 films selected for the Lars Von Trier Project: Gesamt Displayed at the Copenhagen festival 2012 
From within or from behind, a light shines through us upon things, and makes us aware that we are nothing, but the light is all. ~Ralph Waldo Emerson 

The track "Some kind of wonderful" is taken from the album "Quixotes Of Moons Fight The Windmills Of Brixton"
